explains: adj. 不平衡的；错乱的；不稳定的；收支不平衡的，未决算的
v. 使失去平衡；使（精神）错乱（unbalance 的过去分词）
wordGroup: unbalanced load 不平衡负荷；失衡负载

sentences.en: The centre of pressure moves rearward and the aeroplane becomes unbalanced.
sentences.cn: 气压中心后移，这架飞机失去了平衡。

sentences.en: The distribution of resources is unbalanced between rural and urban schools.
sentences.cn: 农村学校与城市学校的资源分配不平衡。

sentences.en: UN officials argued that the report was unbalanced.
sentences.cn: 联合国官员们辩称那份报告有失公正。
